publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3018.1 Bill Aitken: Scottish Government Continues to Deliver on Police Numbers—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3018) in the name of Stuart McMillan, leave out from "acknowledges" to "pledges" and insert "notes that the increase in police numbers was made possible only through the pressure applied by the Scottish Conservatives during last year’s budget process."

S3M-3018.1 Bill Aitken: Scottish Government Continues to Deliver on Police Numbers—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3018) in the name of Stuart McMillan, leave out from "acknowledges" to "pledges" and insert "notes that the increase in police numbers was made possible only through the pressure applied by the Scottish Conservatives during last year’s budget process."
